title: R(D)SVS Quality Assurance and Enhancement Committee Chair Notes
text:
Preface
This open source, Creative Commons licensed e-book is intended to be a resource for those participating in Quality Assurance and Enhancement in Higher Education.
I intend to provide continuity for the Chairing of the committee, but also its operations.

title: 1  Guiding Principles
text:
This document arises from my maternity leave. When I returned from maternity leave, I realised that I hadn’t left very good instructions
I am personally guided by the idea that Quality Assurance is Not a Morally Neutral Concept.
To that end, I am influenced by the open access principles.
QA Scotland’s Enhancement Framework
The University of Edinburgh’s guidance.

title: Induction
text:
The induction process covers recruiting new committee members and ensuring that all members have a shared understanding of the committee’s requirements and goals.
